page.title: 13PLANNING A BYPASS FOR LEEK
page.content: The planned route begins east of Leek off the Ashbourne road,sweeps southwards across open fields to cross the Cheddleton road,then turns westwards to join the main A53 road through the Potteries.It is hoped this will relieve the traffic build-up in the Town Centre.The Planning Committee are presently conducting traffic surveys and there are public meetings and exhibitions to enable the town people to decide if it is necesary.Objectors to the plan believe it will spoil woods and countryside. My friend and I will see lorries and cars thundering by our bedroom windows instead of fields and cows.
